com.camerontec.util.objects

Class ObjectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.objects.ObjectUtils

  • public class ObjectUtils
extends Object
    Utilities used to create and manipulate objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createObject

        public static <T> T createObject(Class<T> clazz)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new instance of the given class, turning any exception into an IllegalArgumentException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to create
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to instantiate
        Returns:
        a new instance of clazz
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if clazz is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if either of the following occurs:
        • clazz is an abstract class
        • clazz does not have a public empty constructor
        • The invocation of the empty constructor in clazz throws an exception

      • serialize

        public static byte[] serialize(Serializable object)
        Returns the serialized representation of the given object.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to serialize
        Returns:
        the serialized representation of this object
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if object is null

      • hash

        public static int hash(int hashCode,
                       int prime,
                       Object object)
        Update a hash code with the hash of a given object, only if the object is not null.
        Parameters:
        hashCode - hash code basis
        prime - prime number used in hash code generation
        object - a possibly null object
        Returns:
        an updated hash code if the object is not null, otherwise the unmodified value specified in hashCode

      • hash

        public static int hash(int hashCode,
                       int prime,
                       boolean boolValue)
        Update a hash code with the hash of a given boolean.

        Uses the same algorithm as Boolean.hashCode().

        Parameters:
        hashCode - hash code basis
        prime - prime number used in hash code generation
        boolValue - boolean value
        Returns:
        an updated hash code

      • hash

        public static int hash(int hashCode,
                       int prime,
                       long longValue)
        Update a hash code with the hash of a given long.

        Uses the same algorithm as Long.hashCode().

        Parameters:
        hashCode - hash code basis
        prime - prime number used in hash code generation
        longValue - long value
        Returns:
        an updated hash code
